## Description {#details}

This structure contains the information necessary for lowering pointer-authenticating indirect calls.

It is equivalent to the &quot;ptrauth&quot; operand bundle found on the call instruction, if any.

Definition at line 4520 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/targetlowering-h">TargetLowering.h</a>.
